completeListOfAbilities.name: Power Break (IX)
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Increases BRV based on party's total MAX BRV
3-hit melee  PG attack +  PF attack
Extra damage to humanoid types
Target: Fair chance 2 turns ATK Down I
Self: 5 turns ATK Up I
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ for 5 turns after use

Self: 5 turns ATK Up I
